lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : cAnON.
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Hiroyuki Sawano
[00:12.213]か弱い光が指差す先
[00:18.221]Silent Haze 霞がちに止まる影
[00:24.778]ハチロクのリズム書き出される
[00:30.342]ぎこちない Innocent Heart
[00:36.637]Close my eyes and feel your order, make them see
[00:42.985]Don’t know what I want. Let go 夢見る
[00:48.706]ジリジリ刻む
[00:53.695]本当の世界笑えた？
[00:59.834]Don't you get there? It calls, it calls
[01:05.973]仰いだ空が色変えるから
[01:12.007]My naked heart can hear echoes, echoes
[01:18.302]知らず求めた Avidity
[01:38.443]拙い祈りが織りなす波
[01:44.582]Modern days 波間で埋まる足
[01:50.720]鼓膜に響くインいつ蓋される
[01:56.546]止めどない rhythm heart
[02:02.893]Plug my ears, I’m afraid you are the tendency
[02:09.084]You don't know how repressed you are you make me blue
[02:15.040]絶え絶え理想
[02:19.925]本当の想いを拾えるか？
[02:25.933]Don't you get there? It calls, it calls
[02:32.098]一個じゃ希望開く螺旋のsong
[02:38.211]My rusted heart can hear echoes, echoes
[02:44.428]あの日失くした avidity
[02:52.474]Whisper your name again
[02:59.004]Restart it right away
[03:03.837]Oh my bitter color ardor wander
[03:08.121]Gotta feel it undercover
[03:11.021]行方も知らない
[03:15.174]Don't you get there? It calls, it calls
[03:21.418]仰いだ空が色変えるから
[03:27.452]My naked heart can hear echoes, echoes
[03:33.721]知らず求めた Avidity
[03:42.002]Whisper your name again
[03:48.402]Restart it right away
[03:52.947]Oh bitter color ardor wander
[03:57.179]Gotta feel it undercover
[04:00.262]行方も知らない
[04:03.266]あの日の群青
